abstract: IAC has hired Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase to advise it on the initial offering and could file an offering prospectus this quarter.
snippet: IAC has hired Bank of America and JPMorgan Chase to advise it on the initial offering and could file an offering prospectus this quarter.
lead_paragraph: 9:01 a.m. | Updated The International Automotive Components Group, the big auto-parts maker owned by Wilbur L. Ross Jr., plans to hold an initial public offering later this year, a person briefed on the matter told DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: Ross’ IAC Aims to Go Public This Year

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
